longBusinessSummary: Shinko Shoji Co., Ltd. sells electronic components and devices in Japan and internationally. It operates through Electronic Device Business, Assembly Business, and Other Business segments. The company offers semiconductors, general electronic components, display devices, and modules. It also provides commissioned development/design solutions, including embedded software and ASIC/FPGA design and development; electronics manufacturing services, such as support services, as well commissioned development and design services for measuring, automotive, medical, information, industrial, and lighting equipment; and embedded business solutions, which includes product and business planning, as well as support ranging from development through production. In addition, the company offers products and solutions for industrial, in-vehicle, communication, office automation, consumer goods, and amusement items. Further, it provides Internet if things solutions; and parts, EMS, development proposals, and systems for the amusement industry, as well as offers AIplay, an aerial image manipulation device. Additionally, the company involves in import and export of components and devices; and business incidental to components and devices. Shinko Shoji Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1953 and is headquartered in Shinagawa, Japan.
